charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) (21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE) Possession with intent to Distribute Methamphetamine, a Schedule II Controlled Substance (1)

charges.charge_disposition: defendant committed to the custody of the USBP for a term of 192 months as to Count 1; upon release from imprisonment, defendant on supervised release for a term of 4 years; defendant fined $500.00 (during the period of supervised release payment shall be $25.00 per month or 25 per cent, whichever is greater), interest waived; defendant to pay a special assessment in the amount of $100.00, due immediately; defendant remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal (1)
Count 2 dismissed on motion of Government (2)

defendant committed to the custody of the USBP for a term of 192 months as to Count 1; upon release from imprisonment, defendant on supervised release for a term of 4 years; defendant fined $500.00 (during the period of supervised release payment shall be $25.00 per month or 25 per cent, whichever is greater), interest waived; defendant to pay a special assessment in the amount of $100.00, due immediately; defendant remanded to the custody of the U.S. Marshal (-1)
